episodes.title: Escaping Polygamy Producer on Cults, Control & Ethical Storytelling
episodes.description: In this episode of The Unscripted Files, host Madelyn Cunningham engages in a deep conversation with Aurelia Boyle, a seasoned producer at RIVR Media. They explore the significance of storytelling in documentary filmmaking and the experience of creating Escaping Polygamy and later Secrets of Polygamy. Aurelia shares her journey in the industry, the challenges of producing sensitive content, and the ethical considerations that come with telling real-life stories. The discussion also touches on the impact of their work on the lives of cult survivors and putting Warren Jeffs behind bars. Throughout the conversation, they emphasize the need for transparency, trust, and a commitment to ethical storytelling in the ever-evolving landscape of unscripted media and wrap it up with Aurelia's new journey in the wonderful world of Vanderpump Rules.
